actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to transfer the N. S. Savannah to Patriot's Point Development Authority, an agency of the State of South Carolina.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to transfer the nuclear ship Savannah to Patriot's Point Development Authority, an agency of the State of South Carolina, to be used as a museum ship and for other public purposes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to transfer the N. S. Savannah to Patriot's Point Development Authority, an agency of the State of South Carolina.
